updates.title: Website Release!
updates.content: The ARMSX2 official website has now been released!
updates.extended_content: Thank you to Tanos and jpolo1224
updates.author: ARMSX2 Team

updates.title: Fake Websites
updates.content: Please be careful of the fake websites out there, we are not affiliated with any of them and they may try to make you download a fake or malicious APK.
updates.author: ARMSX2 Team

updates.title: Site Update
updates.content: The site has been created and is being maintained by @tanossh.i on Discord or tanosshi on GitHub
updates.extended_content: Thanks to jpolo1224 for assisting with the website content
updates.author: tanosshi

updates.title: Details
updates.content: ARMSX2 is a new open source emulator for the PS2, it is based on the PCSX2 emulator and aims to be the next step in PS2 emulation on Android, as well as cross platform support for iOS and Mac OS.
updates.author: jpolo1224
